data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during PRINCIPE cruise from La Coruña to Montevideo started at 1770-12-17
Ship: Principe (Fragata Correo), Voyage: La Coruña - Montevideo, 1st Observer: Cayetano Antúnez (Capitan)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
